name: Nail Fashion Salon
description:
Get gorgeous nails for free!!! The ultimate nail makeover will transform your hands and make them the object of envy. Explore your passion for design & creativity as you match the designs given by our experts! You are all set for a party now!
Features:
•Match nail art with images given in each level
•3 different skin tones
•Lovely shades of nail paint
•Beautiful collection of ribbons
•Sparkling diamonds and gemstones
•Artificial fashion nails
•Hand tattoos
•Nail art designs
•Rings to decorate your fingers.
As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements.
